description: n OR n^2 (applied to ternary expansions).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: b=3; d=9; Mb=Array[ b^(d-#)&, d ]; Map[ Plus@@(Mb*#)&, Array[ Max /@ Transpose[ {IntegerDigits[ #, b, d ], IntegerDigits[ #^2, b, d ]} ]&, 140 ] ]
